Location:
- Ceiling vent/grille in interior room with textured plaster ceiling.

Observations:
- Rectangular metal vent with vertical slats, flush mounted.
- Frame secured with screws; white painted finish.
- Textured ceiling surface (popcorn/knockdown style).
- No visible water stains, mold, rust, or gaps around the frame.
- No obvious loose parts or wiring hazards.

Potential Issues:
- No visible issues.

Recommendations:
- Periodic cleaning of the vent grille to maintain airflow.
- Monitor for any future signs of moisture or staining; address promptly if detected.
